p: COVID-19 is a novel virus disease with over 7250,000 confirmed cases worldwide [ 1]. And the knowledge regarding epidemiology and clinical presentation has been evolving gradually in the past months since the initial identification. In the general population, the reported case fatality rate ranged from 1.2 to 11.9% in different countries [ 2, 3]. Xu et al. [ 4] described that 113 patients had persistently positive PCRs results for at least 21 days. And Lu et al. [ 5] also reported a maximum 20 days of prolonged viral clearance period.
